name: notekeeper
description: NoteKeeper transforms your new tab into a minimalist, auto-saving text editor with a sidebar companion.
author: semanticdata

scripts.dev:newtab: npm run build && web-ext run --source-dir packages/newtab
scripts.dev:sidebar: npm run build && web-ext run --source-dir packages/sidebar
scripts.package:newtab: npm run build && web-ext build --source-dir packages/newtab
scripts.package:sidebar: npm run build && web-ext build --source-dir packages/sidebar
scripts.package:all: npm run build && web-ext build --source-dir packages/newtab && web-ext build --source-dir packages/sidebar
